_header: A soul that list to sing of love
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 38.
Title(s): Burial of Christ and His Resurrection
_description: The ‘Bodley’ Burial of Christ and His Resurrection — 1631 lines in various stanzas, mostly 8-line, aaabcccb

BodeMus160.First Lines:
A Soule that list to singe of loueOf Crist that com till vs so
                    lawe…
BodeMus160.Attributed Title:
The prologe of this treyte or meditation off the buryalle of Criste and
                    mowrnyng therat (f. 140); Thus here endes the most holy Beriall of þe body
                    of crist Ihesu (f. 156v)
